title: Minecraft - Pocket Edition v0.9.0 Build 2 Beta.apk
description:
Update 0.9.0 is an upcoming update for Minecraft Pocket Edition. It is a mainly survival-oriented update and will provide Pocket Edition with a bunch of new and exciting additions. These features are changes or additions most likely going to be added in Minecraft 0.9.0. Johan has released a tweet stating that 0.9.0 has gone into the bug fixing phase. There is no official release date New Biomes[1]

    Jungle (confirmed)
    Roofed Forest (confirmed)
    Mesa (confirmed)
    Savannas (confirmed)
    Taiga (confirmed)
    Mushroom Island (confirmed)
    River (confirmed)
    The Far Biome (0.9.1) 

Generated Structures

    Caves (confirmed) (optional)
    Lava Pools (confirmed)
    Abandoned Mineshafts (Confirmed)
    Villages (confirmed)
    Stronghold (Confirmed) 

Mobs

Passive

    Villagers (confirmed)
        Have degraded AI and cannot be traded with 
    Mooshrooms (confirmed) 

Neutral

    Wolf (confirmed)
    Enderman (confirmed)
        Enderpearls will not be added in 0.9.0 

Hostile

    Silverfish (confirmed)
    Slimes (confirmed) 

New Blocks

    Diorite, Granite, and Andesite, in normal and polished versions.
    Mycelium
    Hardened Clay and Stained Clay (Up to 16 colors)
    Red Sand (confirmed, in Mesa and Plateau Biomes)
    Podzol
    End stone (possibly)
    Packed Ice (confirmed)
    Emerald Ore (confirmed)
    Mob spawners (confirmed)
    End Portal Frame (confirmed)
        Does not take you to The End, Decoration. 

Creative Inventory Additions

Items from past updates that will be added to the creative menu in update 0.9.0.

    Bone
    Raw Beef
    Bowl 

Trees

    Acacia Trees
    Dark Oak Trees
    Jungle Trees 

Plants

    Vines
    Double Tall Grass
    Large Fern
    Acacia Sapling
    Jungle Sapling
    Dark Oak Sapling (Cannot be grown by Bonemeal) 

Wood

    Dark Oak Wood
    Acacia Wood 

Items

    Cocoa (Can be farmed by using Jungle Wood)
    Spawn eggs (For all mobs) 

Naturally Generated Blocks

    Pumpkins
    Tall Grass
    Dead Bushes
    Ferns
    Stone Bricks
    Cracked Stone Bricks
    Mossy Stone Bricks
    Stone Bricks Stairs
    Stone Slabs
    Iron Bars
    Torch
    Mob Spawners 

Flowers

    Poppy (Will Replace The Rose (Cyan Flower)
    Blue Orchid
    Allium
    Azure Bluet
    Tulips (Available in all 4 colors)
    Oxeye Daisy
    Sun Flower
    Lilac
    Rose Bush
    Peony 

Technical Changes

    Updated inventory and crafting screen 

Crafting

Crafting Menu in 0.9.0

    Invisible Bedrock Gets Removed If world is changed to infinite
    New textures for the tops and bottoms of birch, spruce and jungle wood
    Biome-tinted Grass
    Spiders are spawned by leaves, created a higher spawning rate of spiders in forests at night. 

World Generation

    Superflat worlds
    Infinite worlds 

Option to select world type

    Default
    Superflat
    Copy existing worlds
    Option to imput the world's seed 

Ability to pick world sizes

All Confirmed

    Legacy (same as current size)
    Small
    Medium
    Large
    Grass shading

    Biome-Tinted Grass
    Infinite 

Options

    In-game option to toggle a world's gamemode 

Other

    New ways to obtain Nether-related items
    Gravel no longer falls from spawn
    Beds no longer restore health
